Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.locking

Class SimpleStatementLocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.locking.SimpleStatementLocks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, StatementLocks
    public class SimpleStatementLocks
extends Object
implements StatementLocks
    A StatementLocks implementation that uses given Locks.Client for both optimistic and pessimistic locks.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(LeaseClient leaseClient,
                       long transactionId)
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Initializes this locks instance with a LeaseClient. Must be called before the first call to StatementLocks.pessimistic() or StatementLocks.optimistic().
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface StatementLocks
        Parameters:
        leaseClient - LeaseClient of the transaction owning this locks instance.
        transactionId - owning transaction id

      • pessimistic

        public Locks.Client pessimistic()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Get Locks.Client responsible for pessimistic locks. Such locks will be grabbed right away.
        Specified by:
        pessimistic in interface StatementLocks
        Returns:
        the locks client to serve pessimistic locks.

      • optimistic

        public Locks.Client optimistic()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Get Locks.Client responsible for optimistic locks. Such locks could potentially be grabbed later at commit time.
        Specified by:
        optimistic in interface StatementLocks
        Returns:
        the locks client to serve optimistic locks.

      • prepareForCommit

        public void prepareForCommit​(LockTracer lockTracer)
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Prepare the underlying client(s) for commit. This will grab all locks that have previously been taken optimistically, and tell the underlying lock client to enter the prepare state.
        Specified by:
        prepareForCommit in interface StatementLocks
        Parameters:
        lockTracer - lock tracer

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Stop the underlying client(s).
        Specified by:
        stop in interface StatementLocks

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Close the underlying client(s).
        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        close in interface StatementLocks

      • activeLocks

        public Stream<ActiveLock> activeLocks()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        List the locks held by this transaction. This method is invoked by concurrent threads in order to inspect the lock state in this transaction.
        Specified by:
        activeLocks in interface StatementLocks
        Returns:
        the locks held by this transaction.

      • activeLockCount

        public long activeLockCount()
        Description copied from interface: StatementLocks
        Get the current number of active locks. Note that the value returned by this method might differ from the number of locks returned by StatementLocks.activeLocks(), since they would introspect the lock state at different points in time.
        Specified by:
        activeLockCount in interface StatementLocks
        Returns:
        the number of active locks in this transaction.
